name: Aswin Asok
bio: i don't want to learn everything by heart. Rather, I would use my logic to derive or apply the best solution.

top_projects.name: editr
top_projects.description: A Minimalist Text Editr web application made using React.js and pure CSS.  Integrated with functions like speech recognition and text statistics.

top_projects.name: InstaFetcher
top_projects.description: This is a python project built using Selenium library which can fetch the usernames of People who aren't following you back.

top_projects.name: Profile-Retriever
top_projects.description: This is a React Project made using Material UI which can fetch the details of a GitHub user using GitHub API. This is my first react.js web-app

top_projects.name: chat-inn
top_projects.description: The Chat'Inn is a simple and minimal realtime chat application whose database is powered by firebase and firestore.

top_projects.name: shotr
top_projects.description: Shorten your links with ease using Shotr! This is a web application made with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js. The UI is minimalistic and clean, and the app has a memory function that makes it easy to use.

top_projects.name: Shopping-Cart
top_projects.description: This is my first Full-stack project made using Nodejs, MongoDB, Express.js and Handlebars. I am currently pausing this project here as I am not able to understand the working of the code and once the confusion has been cleared I will resume it.

top_projects.name: lev
top_projects.description: ev App is a lightweight and cool web application that provides a list of upcoming holidays.  The app is built using React.js and Pure CSS, with a touch of my creativity, resulting in a sleek and modern design that is easy to navigate

top_projects.name: vow
top_projects.description: vow is a simple & static app that displays an affirmation along with a fact about it.

BuildNShip/hoogo.summary: Recent activities in the BuildNShip/hoogo repository include multiple push events with various features and fixes added, such as adding total connections, images, and a carousel, as well as fixes for build issues, responsive design, and leaderboards, indicating a significant amount of development and refinement.

theparentcompany-xyz/makemypass-app.summary: The theparentcompany-xyz/makemypass-app repository has seen substantial activity with numerous push events, focusing on features like rejection-approval systems, user submission structures, and finance-related updates, along with several bug fixes and improvements for user interfaces, APIs, and more, showing comprehensive development and maintenance efforts.

Scaleupvillage/scaleup25.summary: The Scaleupvillage/scaleup25 repository has had notable activities, including push events that introduced a flipbook feature, updated forms, and made adjustments to stalls and form fields, along with some merge operations, indicating ongoing enhancements and refinements to the repository's content and structure.

profile_summary:
Aswin Asok is a highly skilled and innovative developer with a strong foundation in programming languages such as JavaScript, C, and TypeScript. With a professional network of 198 followers and a portfolio of 113 public repositories, Aswin has established himself as a reliable and accomplished professional in the field of software development. His approach to problem-solving is centered around logical thinking and creative application, allowing him to derive and implement effective solutions to complex technical challenges.

Aswin's technical expertise and passion for development have earned him a reputation as a high-performing and results-driven professional. By leveraging his skills in JavaScript, C, and TypeScript, he delivers high-quality solutions that meet the needs of his clients and peers. With a focus on using logic to drive innovation, Aswin continues to push the boundaries of what is possible in software development, making him a valuable asset to any project or team. His dedication to his craft and commitment to staying at the forefront of industry trends make him an exceptional developer and a sought-after collaborator in the field of software development.
